comment: Obsolete version of ~ sb4vOLD as of 8-Jul-2023. Version of ~ sb4OLD with a disjoint variable condition instead of a distinctor antecedent, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 23-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
